publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-594 Mr Frank McAveety: Celebrating 150 Years of Public Libraries in Scotland-That the Parliament notes that this year marks the 150th anniversary of the Public Libraries Act in Scotland; congratulates public libraries on the diverse service they provide and, in particular, commends them for the success of the People's Network in encouraging even greater use of library facilities, and praises local authorities for the part they play in providing this service.
